item.title: The Power of Positive Affirmations (and Power Automate)
item.description: My Recent Neurospicy Journey (TW: obsessive thoughts) It started when I was driving to my uncle’s house on the highway to watch a Chiefs playoff game. It probably started way earlier than that, but that’s the first time I remember it happening. I was driving, and suddenly I was stricken with the thought, “How do I know how to stay in the lanes of the highway? What would happen if I drifted out of my lane?
